name: @vidaxl/cowlog
description: Eyecachig logging library for development purposes

scripts.test: git branch && node_modules/nyc/bin/nyc.js --reporter=lcov --reporter=clover --reporter=text mocha tests && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js; ls -lah; ls -lah coverage;mkdir build/;mkdir build/logs/;cp -r coverage/* build/logs/; ls -lah;

author: Imre Toth
